column4: I've upgraded to karmic and my games doesn't have sound, someone can help me/
Have you checked in System->Prefences>Sound that its not muted for just that application?
It needs the game open to see it :)

it shows 100% but I can't hear anithing
Have you checked the game prefences?
Yes and it is ok too
Thats odd, what game is it?
